nodes.text: The THORN Crisis Specialist was a Human male employee of the Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralization during the Galactic War. He was present during the rakghoul pandemic on Alderaan, stationed in the crisis command center within the rakghoul tunnels and tasked Republic THORN volunteers with various tasks. Later, he was also stationed in the rakghoul tunnels on Tatooine and Corellia.
